name: By The Ramparts
description:
A traveler from another world finds themselves lost beyond the Ramparts, having fallen into the courtyard of the Night Spire Citadel.  Meet Mai, an aspiring Chronicler with her pet familiar as the two of them try to find the traveler's way home.

Meet Mai's friends and mentors in a short, sweet adventure all wrapped up in a visual novel.

4x Characters with multiple expressions.

4x Locations to visit.

2x Endings with different branches of exploration.

2x Musical scores attributed to Kevin Macleod @ Incompetech.

This visual novel is part of a larger body of work, namely a TTRPG system.

Once the system is out, I'll be sure to link to it here.  Until then, stay tuned and I hope you enjoy this little adventure!
